alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Griggs; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cass, southwestern Traill, southern Griggs, northern Barnes and southern Steele Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Cooperstown to 6 miles southeast of Sibley to near Arthur. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arthur, Hunter, Hope, Page, Grandin, Hannaford and Galesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
